p: It takes a pathogen but also a susceptible host and an unsafe environment to generate an epidemic: The Bronx in New York City, the Cape Flats in Cape Town, Brasilandia in Sao Paolo, Dharavi in Mumbai. Epidemics concentrate in areas of existing social, economic, and health inequities, human rights abuses, and leadership vacuums both domestically and globally, and COVID-19 is no exception.
